sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script runs for upgrades instances and copies the TCM MIM properties from TCM scope to global scope properties</description> <name>Fix TCM MIM Properties</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { if (GlidePluginManager.isZboot()) return;
gs.setProperty('com.snc.iam.email_client_recipient_items_enabled', gs.getProperty('sn_comm_management.email_client_recipient_items_enabled'));
gs.setProperty('com.snc.iam.default_email_recipient_field', gs.getProperty('sn_comm_management.default_email_recipient_field')); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-04-19 19:08:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e39d46a18792e110de52a64d0ebb35d6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Fix TCM MIM Properties</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Task Communications Management" source="sn_comm_management">8dfe92d95373030029200ef5d5dc348a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Task Communications Management">8dfe92d95373030029200ef5d5dc348a</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e39d46a18792e110de52a64d0ebb35d6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-04-21 05:52:09</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>true</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
